oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Recycling is a must!
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Seuri, Pentti
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Farming Systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In stockless organic farming even 2-4 fold field area is needed to produce equal amount of product compared to conventional farming without fallowing. Integration between livestock farms and stockless farms is in a key role to improve farming.
